attributes.action: Stop Authorities Being Used As Harrassment Weapons
attributes.additional_details: Stop the anonymity rule to stop Mallicious Reports, to Benefits, Councils, Social Services Police etc, (unless good cause for anonimity), To prevent Mallicious Reportee's, using Authorities as Harrassment & Bullying Tools & preventing the identity of the Mallicious Complainant, being known,using the authorities Own Regulations as Protection from Prosecution !, (Hence a Weapon),when complaints are used Malliciously,the Perpetrator, should be open to Prosecution, (Harrassment,etc in some cases Racism, Disabilty, Sex or Age Discrimination. also conspiracey , if they involve others,in their unlawfull actions, Results amount to the worst of Assaults causing Harm /Distress, in extreme cercumstances Mental and Physical Illness,sometimes Suiside,(good reason to report someone,good reason to put your name). saving, Time and Money, bringing real criminals to justice on both sides, ie GENUINE & UNDERLYING CRIMINALS(Mallicious Reporters)
